name: Top Down Shooter (Anomaly games)
description: This was a team project assignment that I participated in. I had originally built a melee combat system with a teleportation execution mechanic but had to scrap to refocus on the already-finished mechanics. The game itself was made in about a week with 5 others working on it. What I did contribute was applying animations to the player as well as the shooting mechanics I revamped and built to play better. Please enjoy our handy work.
